name: The Curious Case of Captain Cray
summary:
After the disastrous wreckage of his ship Captain Cray finds himself and his crew upon a curious island of dreams, where his crewmates are found in deep slumber. There, he realizes he can miraculously enter their dreams by resting himself...

Will Captain Cray be able to rescue his crew? Or will they forever be succumbed to their nightmares?
